be in order.translation[0].definitions[0: if something is in order, it is correct or right
be in order.translation[0].definitions[1: to be a suitable thing to do or say on a particular occasion
I hear congratulations are in order.
be in order.translation[0].definitions[2: if an official document is in order, it is legal and correct
be in order.translation[0].definitions[3: if something that you do is in order, it is allowed by the rules in a committee, court, parliament etc
